modName: Leather Armor Retex Black Thieves Style
descriptionHtml:
A simple re-texture of four pieces of armor my character is using at the moment.

-Leather Armor (player crafted)

-Novice Hood

-Steel Gauntlets (actually some magic gaunts that use the steel gaunt model)

-Hide Boots (actually some magic boots that use the hide boots model)


these textures will apply to any and ALL items that use these base models.
author: sabat9
